#summary Multiverse Maven repository details
#labels Phase-Deploy

Multiverse artifacts are available from the project's Maven repositories. To access these, add the following to your POM:

{{{
<repository>
  <id>multiverse-releases</id>
  <url>http://multiverse.googlecode.com/svn/maven-repository/releases</url>
</repository>
<snapshotRepository>
  <id>multiverse-snapshots</id>
  <url>http://multiverse.googlecode.com/svn/maven-repository/snapshots</url>
</snapshotRepository>
}}}
